timeline.message:
remove unnecessary persist

Signed-off-by: Ratan Rai Sur <ratan.r.sur@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Current behaviour for Mainnet block importer being persisting the state on every block imported.
Any thoughts on the potential impact this PR might have? ...is the state still persisted on each block imported (perhaps done elsewhere), or is the persist performed less frequently, if so at what cadence?
timeline.author: CjHare

replies.bodyText:
